p: Fourth, it is indispensable to maintain suitable precautionary measures even during conveyance of the patient to and from the imaging facility, not only to avoid contamination of the patient and the related healthcare professional, but also to protect the sanitization of the environment. Separate pathways may be assumed for patients with COVID-19 infection. Creation of a stroke greenway while transporting the patient to consultation suites, imaging rooms or angiographic suites may be a viable option. A suspect or confirmed case must be admitted in an isolation ward afterwards, keeping suspects apart from confirmed cases.
